Item Class: Rings
Rarity: Rare
Brimstone Knot
Sapphire Ring
--------
Quality (Lightning Modifiers): +20% (augmented)
--------
Requires: Level 60
--------
Item Level: 79
--------
+25% to Cold Resistance (implicit)
--------
Adds 4 to 72 Lightning damage to Attacks
29% increased Chaos Damage
+19% to all Elemental Resistances
+36% to Fire Resistance
+44% to Lightning Resistance
+129 to maximum Mana (desecrated)
